Change Log
==========

## 0.1.3
 * Always ignoring empty lines (540d7c49aec15e1e6c1fc5296f46de9d46aa3920)

## 0.1.2

## 0.1.1
 * Adding ignore capability to ListFile

## 0.1.0
 * Updating API documentation
 * Adding JSONFile and ListFile special methods and options

## 0.0.1
 * Initial Release
